Title: Angels in the Outfield
Writer: Dorothy Kingsley, George Wells, Richard Conlin, Dorothy Kingsley (screenplay), George Wells (screenplay), Holly Goldberg Sloan (screenplay)
Actors: Danny Glover, Brenda Fricker, Tony Danza, Christopher Lloyd
Plot: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.
